entities.name: griphook
entities.description: A goblin who is angry with Harry Potter for saying the wrong thing about the sword.

entities.name: godric gryffindor
entities.description: The founder of Gryffindor house in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Griphook is a Gryffindor, which means he belonged to the house founded by Godric Gryffindor.
